unnormalised: Arre yaar, this reminds me of my college days! Back then, everyone was so stressed about their roll numbers (like, rollno. 123456789, as if it's some lottery ticket!). And don't even get me started on the placement registration ID - had to remember regID_BITS_2020 to even stand a chance at getting a job. Now I just need to remember my PAN and Aadhaar. Life's a joke, isn't it?
normalised: Arre yaar, this reminds me of my college days! Back then, everyone was so stressed about their roll numbers (like, roll number one hundred and twenty three million four hundred and fifty six thousand seven hundred and eighty nine, as if it's some lottery ticket!). And don't even get me started on the placement registration I-D - had to remember reg I-D underscore B-I-T-S underscore two thousand and twenty to even stand a chance at getting a job. Now I just need to remember my P-A-N and Aadhaar. Life's a joke, isn't it?
